summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing photos from a previous night. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended solely for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing photos and requesting a call from Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley appear to have a personal or professional relationship, as indicated by the informal nature of the email.

keyFacts: The email was sent on January 21, 2011.
Jeffrey Epstein discusses photos from a previous night.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
